author: Diario Deportivo Olé
title: Gareca: "Me da tranquilidad que Paulo haya renovado con River" :: Olé - ole.com.ar
text: Una de las noticias que mayor tranquilidad trajo en el mundo [River](https://www.ole.com.ar/tema/river-plate.html) durante este mercado de pases fue la [renovación de contrato de Paulo Díaz](https://www.ole.com.ar/river-plate/river-paulo-diaz-renovacion-contrato-mejora-salarial-oferta-arabia-saudita_0_CEtLWgxGwo.html). El chileno decidió rechazar una millonaria oferta del Al Qadsiah de Arabia y extender su vínculo con el CARP hasta diciembre de 2027. Ante esta elección del defensor chileno, [Ricardo Gareca](https://www.ole.com.ar/tema/ricardo-gareca.html), entrenador de la selección trasandina, también reconoció que la elección del zaguero de 29 años "me da tranquilidad" y destacó que el campeonato argentino "es una de las ligas más difíciles del mundo". "¿Renovó? Entonces, más tranquilidad, por supuesto, porque es altamente competitiva", fue la frase con la que el entrenador argentino de Chile que se formó en las inferiores de Boca y luego llegó a River junto con Oscar Ruggeri. "Prefiero que los jugadores sigan en lugares competitivos. Que tengan competencia permanente, no lapsos de estar tiempo parados, como en Estados Unidos", agregó Gareca. Esta cuestión que el Tigre remarcó fue algo fundamental para que [Paulo Díaz](https://www.ole.com.ar/tema/paulo-diaz.html) logre el alto nivel al que llegó en este último semestre: disputó un total de 162 partidos en los cinco años que lleva en River y estuvo presente en 25 de los 29 partidos que el equipo de [Martín Demichelis](https://www.ole.com.ar/tema/martin-demichelis.html) tuvo en el primer semestre de este 2024, números que demuestran la regularidad del defensor en el CARP. Otra referencia de Gareca al hablar sobre el presente y futuro de PD17 fue la exigencia del fútbol argentino. "Viajo a Europa, hablo con los jugadores de Europa y la liga argentina es una de las más difíciles del mundo, como las sudamericanas. Me interesa que pasen y compitan en la liga argentina", enfatizó el entrenador de 66 años, nuevamente revalidando y respaldando la decisión de uno de los hombres clave de La Roja. Sin influencia en la decisión del jugador Cuando el DT de Chile fue consultado sobre si tuvo alguna influencia en la decisión de Paulo Díaz, fue contundente. "Trato de no tener influencia en lo que resuelven los jugadores porque son decisiones personales, pero estoy seguro de que Paulo se inclinó por seguir en un alto nivel de competencia", dijo el Tigre.

author: chilevision.cl
title: "Daño irreparable": Advierten posibles consecuencias para la observación astronómica por megaproyecto en el desierto de Atacama - Chilevisión
text: Se trata de un proyecto que se emplazaría a solo 10 kilómetros del observatorio Paranal y que, de acuerdo al director general de ESO, contaminaría "los cielos más prístinos del mundo".

author: Reuters
title: Biden says American Judith Weinstein was killed by Hamas on Oct 7
text:
Christiansted, St. Croix: American Judith Weinstein, who was believed to have been kidnapped by Hamas, was killed by the Palestinian Islamist group on Oct 7 when it attacked Israel, President Joe Biden said on Thursday, adding he was devastated by the news.
Weinstein was 70. Her husband, Gadi Haggai, 73, was killed on the same day, Biden said last week.
"This tragic development cuts deep, coming on the heels of last week’s news that Judith’s beloved husband, Gad Haggai, is believed to have been killed by Hamas," Biden said in a statement, vowing to continue fighting for the release of other hostages still held by Hamas.
Working while on holiday in the US Virgin Islands, Biden said he would never forget what the couple's daughter and the family members of other Americans held hostage in Gaza told him when he met with them this month.
"They have been living through hell for weeks. No family should have to endure such an ordeal. And I reaffirm the pledge we have made to all the families of those still held hostage: we will not stop working to bring them home," Biden said.
Biden and national security adviser Jake Sullivan have been deeply engaged on the hostage issue, according to administration officials. Biden has spoken numerous times with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and the emir of Qatar on securing their release.
Hamas attacked kibbutzim, border towns and a music festival in Israel on Oct 7 in a rampage that left 1,200 dead, with 240 people taken to Gaza as hostages, according to Israeli tallies. Israel's assault on Gaza has killed over 21,000 Palestinians, according to Gaza health authorities.
Of the hostages, 110 were freed during a short truce in late November and another 23 have now been declared dead in absentia, an Israeli government spokesperson said on Thursday.
The Hostages and Missing Families Forum said that between five and 10 of the hostages hold US citizenship.
ADVERTISEMENT (Published 28 December 2023, 21:39 IST)

author: Pamela Riemenschneider
title: Latest pesticide residue report again finds 99% of food samples below benchmark levels
text:
WASHINGTON, Nov. 7, 2024 – The U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) today published the 2023 Pesticide Data Program (PDP) Annual Summary. The summary shows that more than 99 percent of the samples tested had pesticide residues below benchmark levels established by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA).
Each year, USDA and EPA work together to identify foods to be tested on a rotating basis by the PDP. In 2023, tests were conducted on 9,832 samples from 21 commodities of fresh and processed fruits and vegetables, and nuts. AMS partners with cooperating state agencies to collect and analyze pesticide residue levels on the selected food commodities.
USDA tests a wide variety of domestic and imported foods, with a strong focus on foods that are consumed by infants and children. EPA relies on PDP data to conduct dietary risk assessments and to ensure that any pesticide residues in foods remain at or below levels that EPA has set. The data also provide regulators, farmers, processors, manufacturers, consumers and scientists with important insights into the actual levels of pesticide residues found on widely consumed foods.
The annual pesticide residue results are reported to the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and EPA in monthly reports as testing takes place throughout the year. FDA and EPA are immediately notified if a PDP test discovers residue levels that could pose a public safety concern.
The 2023 data and summary can be found on the Pesticide Data Program page of the AMS website. Inquiries may be addressed to the USDA Agricultural Marketing Service, Science and Technology Program, Monitoring Programs Division by e-mail at amsmpo.data@usda.gov .
For more information about pesticides and food, please visit the EPA website and the FDA website.

author: Accuweather
title: GA WFO ATLANTA Warnings, Watches, and Advisories
text:
WFO ATLANTA Warnings, Watches and Advisories for Thursday, May 9, 2024
SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING
Severe Weather Statement
National Weather Service Peachtree City GA
228 AM EDT Thu May 9 2024

SOUTHEASTERN WALKER AND NORTHEASTERN CHATTOOGA COUNTIES IS

The severe thunderstorm which prompted the warning has moved out of
the warned area. Therefore, the warning has been cancelled.
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM EDT for northwestern
People are also reading…
Georgia.

FOR CENTRAL GORDON COUNTY...
At 228 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Resaca, or near
Calhoun, moving east at 30 mph.
HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.

Locations impacted include...
Calhoun, Resaca, Sugar Valley, Redbud, Nickelsville, and Audubon.
PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

author: Kevin Verdezoto
title: Brighton vence y respira en la Premier League
text:
El Brighton obtuvo su primera victoria del 2025 y respira en la tabla de posiciones en la Premier League de Inglaterra al imponerse 2-0 en su visita al Ipswich.
El lateral ecuatoriano, Pervis Estupiñán, fue titular los 90 minutos del compromiso, donde fue clave en la fase ofensiva, gracias a su velocidad.
Lea: Joel Ordóñez brilla con gol en la victoria del Brujas sobre Genk por la Copa de Bélgica
Los goles llegaron en el segundo tiempo luego de una primera mitad muy disputada, donde el japonés Kaoru Mitoma puso el 1-0 al minuto 59.
Con el gol, el partido se abrió y tuvo un ida y vuelta que terminó con la segunda conquista de las gaviotas.
Georginio Rutter puso el 2-0 final al minuto 81, sellando una victoria que sirve a un Brighton que no ganaba desde el mes de noviembre.
Con el triunfo, el Brighton alcanza el noveno lugar con 31 unidades, mientras que el Ipwsich sigue en puestos de descensos (18) con 16 puntos.

author: Ansa
title: Cybersicurezza, nel 2025 nuovi pericoli derivanti dall'IA
text: Cybersicurezza, nel 2025 nuovi pericoli derivanti dall'IA (ANSA) - MILANO, 15 NOV - Nel 2025, il panorama delle minacce informatiche si evolverà rapidamente con l'ascesa di tecnologie come l'intelligenza artificiale e l'informatica quantistica. Secondo Check Point Software, organizzazione che si occupa di cybersecurity, gli hacker sfrutteranno le recenti tecnologie di IA per ampliare il raggio d'azione dei loro attacchi. Le previsioni degli esperti parlano di malware adattivi e campagne di phishing altamente personalizzate, capaci di ingannare anche i navigatori più attenti. I ransomware, che bloccano i sitemi richiedendo riscatti per il ripristino, diventeranno più sofisticati e automatizzati, prendendo di mira le catene di approvvigionamento globali. L'uso improprio di strumenti di intelligenza artificiale, come ChatGpt potrebbe inoltre portare all'esposizione accidentale di dati sensibili, mentre l'informatica quantistica minaccerà i metodi di crittografia attuali, considerati i migliori per proteggere informazioni e sistemi. Non mancheranno, per Check Point Software, le problematiche ai social media, dove i contenuti fasulli generati dall'IA, i deepfake, saranno sfruttati per attacchi mirati e truffe. I criminali aumenteranno la diffusione di foto, video e file audio artefatti per alzare il livello delle loro attività. Per contrastare queste minacce, i centri operativi di difesa adotteranno dei supporti, anch'essi dotati di IA e chiamati "copilot", così da migliorare l'efficienza del rilevamento e delle risposte agli attacchi. Alcuni ruoli tecnici evolveranno, come i responsabili dell'informazione e della sicurezza (Cio e Ciso), per lavorare di concerto e gestire in maniera integrata i rischi. (ANSA). .
